about_the_game:
Another Door is a party game combining turn-based roguelike and gambling for an adventure between betrayal and forced friendship. Hide your intentions, bluff your opponents and bet on your luck with the sole purpose of saving your soul…

On your journey, you'll have to face enemies beyond your imagination, but also the decisions of your "allies". Cooperation is one strategy, betrayal is another - it's up to you to make the right choices.

Think carefully before you walk through another door...

Shared screen, well-guarded intentions: play with up to 4 players on the same screen while keeping your choices secret, and only reveal your darkest plans at the very last moment.

Open another door: face the number of cards indicated, collect the reward and end your adventure here, safe in the knowledge that you'll get out alive, or continue, taking all the risks in the hope of obtaining more gems.

A gambling game based on risk management and luck: no need to be the fastest, have the best reflexes, or know how to aim. Only your audacity, your eloquence, and a good dose of luck will serve you here.

Multiple choices: every encounter is a source of tragic decisions. You'll have to make the right choice at the right time. Will you be smarter than your companions in misfortune?

Forced friendships: your relationships with others can save your skin, or on the contrary, lead to your downfall. Honesty is one option, lying is another. How many betrayals can you accept before ending your friendship?


An endless adventure in a nightmarish environment: 

  • tons of creepy encounters to unlock according to your choices

  • numerous effects affecting your decisions

  • unique powers to get rid of your "friends

  • random celestial events that sow chaos

  • a group of unpredictable players under pressure

It's guaranteed that no two games will be the same.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains fight scenes involving the death of certain characters. Monsters, blood, weapons and alcohol can be seen in the game design.
